episode.title: Hopped Up on Holiday Juice
episode.rawTitle: 144: ‘Hopped Up on Holiday Juice’ With Matthew Panzarino
episode.author: Daring Fireball / John Gruber
episode.description: Special Guest Matthew Panzarino. Topics include Apple's quarterly financial results, rumors of Apple working on VR handsets and "wireless" charging for iPhones, Bezos charts, and more.
episode.showNotes:
